page.title: 15Farming in Elton/ Birchover
page.content: Dairy-farming and stock-rearing are the main branches of farming in this area with some sheep and pig-rearing, a small acreage of arable land (mainly barley) and some egg production. With the exception of "Oddo Farm" farms are worked by the family. Most fields are small and enclosed by stone walls. The making of silage has increased in recent years but some farmers still gather hay only. Mechanisation increases from year to year. Milk is collected daily by a milk tanker and taken to a bottling plant in Sheffield. Livestock markets are at Bakewell and Uttoxeter.
